ЁЯЧ║я╕П
Expansionist

He defeated the Mauryas of Konkan, the Kadambas of Vanavasi, and the Nalas of Bellary. The Mahakuta Pillar inscription calls him 'Night-Creator' (destructive night for enemies).

ЁЯЫХ
Architecture

He continued the construction work of the Badami Caves (especially Cave 3 - Vishnu Cave).

ЁЯУМ
Important Facts (Exam Points)
  • Title: Pururana-parakrama.
  • Successor: His son Pulakeshin II was young, so his brother Mangalesha ascended the throne.
